verses.text: And the word of the \sc Lord\sc* came unto me, saying,
Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree, \add or than\add* a branch which is among the trees of the forest?
Shall wood be taken thereof to do \add any\add* work? or will \add men\add* take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?
Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burnt. Is it meet for \add any\add* work?
Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for \add any\add* work, when the fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?
Therefore thus saith the Lord \sc God\sc*; As the vine tree among the trees of the forest, which I have given to the fire for fuel, so will I give the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from \add one\add* fire, and \add another\add* fire shall devour them; and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the \sc Lord\sc*, when I set my face against them.
And I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, saith the Lord \sc God\sc*.
